item.title: Research
item.description: Are modern movies more complex than old ones? Are modern movies better than old ones? Is Lawrence of Arabia superior to Dune? One might say: fighting over tastes is tasteless. True. But this question isn’t purely about taste. If old movies are so good, why do we keep watching new ones? This question has always bothered me, and so Peeter Tinits and I decided to operationalize it. Could it be that modern movies are more technologically superior, similarly to how modern airplanes are more superior to old ones?
